sentences.sContent: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.sCn: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

sentences.sContent: ...People don't just go in a local grocery store and buy these supplements...
...from 24-hour grocery stores to online shopping sites that never close...
...these producers' savings probably translate into lower prices at the grocery store...

trans.tranOther: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket
